title: What are the all-time best songs in the English language? - Quora

response.answer_text: Here are some of the (what I consider) best English Songs from my playlist: AC/DC: You Shook Me All Night Long, Highway to Hell, Back In Black, Thunderstruck.Adele : Set Fire In The Rain, Rolling In The Deep, Someone Like You.Bob Dylan: The Times They Are A Changin', Blowing In The Wind, Like A Rolling Stone, Things Have Changed, Thunder On The Mountain, Hurricane.Bob Marley: Buffalo Soldier, Redemption Song, Stir It Up, Jamming, No Woman No Cry, Ganja Gun, Bum Bhole Naath.Bon Jovi: Always, Living On A Prayer, I'll Be There For You, It's My Life.Bruce Springsteen: Born In The USA, Dancing In The Dark, Born To Run, State Trooper, Fire.Bryan Adams: Everything I Do, Best Of Me, Here I am, Have You Ever Really Loved A Woman, Please Forgive Me.Celine Dion: Call The Man, All By Myself, A New Day Has Come, My Heart Will Go On.Cold Play: Fix You, Viva La Vida, Paradise, ShiverEddie Vedder: Better Man, Hard Sun, Society, Guaranteed, Long Road, Rise, Setting Forth.Elvis Presley: Bridge Over Troubled Water, Always On My Mind, Heartbreak Hotel, Hound Dog, It's Now or Never.Eminem: Not Afraid, Stan, Love The Way You Lie.Eric Clapton: Layla, Cocaine, I Shot The Sheriff, Tears In Heaven.Frank Sinatra: It Was A Very Good Year, My Way, That's Life, Strangers In The NightGuns N Roses: Civil War, Knockin' On Heaven's Door, Paradise City, Sweet Child O'Mine, November Rain.Jimmy Hendrix: All Along The Watchtower, Voodoo Child, Third Stone From The Sun, Purple Haze, Hey Joe.John Lennon: Give Peace A Chance, Imagine, Jealous Guy, Mind Games, Woman, Instant Karma.Linkin Park: Breaking The Habit, Crawling, In The End, Waiting For The End, Somewhere I Belong.Led Zeppelin: Dazed & Confused, Achilles Last Stand, Kashmir, Stairway To Heaven, Immigrant Song.Marvin Gaye: Ain't No Mountain High Enough, What's Going On, Let's Get It On, Sexual Healing.Metallica: One, Nothing Else Matters, Enter Sandman, Unforgiven.Michael Jackson: Beat It, Dangerous, Billie Jean, Earth Song.Nirvana: Smells Like Teen Spirit, The Man Who Sold The World, Come As You are, Lithium.Phil Collins: Against All Odds, Another Day In The Paradise, In The Air Tonight, Sussudio, One More Night, Land Of Confusion.Pink Floyd: Time, Coming Back To Life, Echoes, Breathe, If, Brain Damage, The Great Gig In The Sky, Us & Them, Comfortably Numb, Learning To Fly, Wish You Were Here, Marooned, Have A Cigar.Queen: Bohemian Rhapsody, Somebody To Love, I Want To Break Free, Show Must Go On, We Are The Champions.Radiohead: Creep, Karma Police, Paranoid Android.Simon & Garfunkel: Bridge Over Troubled Water, Mrs. Robinson, The Boxer, Sound Of Silence.The Beatles: A Day In The Life, Across The Universe, Come Together, Hey Jude, In My Life, My Guitar Gently Weeps, Obla-Di-Obla-Da.The Doors: Break On Through, Light My Fire, L.A. Woman, Love Me Two Times, People Are Strange, Riders On The Storm, The End, When The Music Is Over, Alabama Song, Moonlight Drive.The Rolling Stones: Gimme Shelter, Satisfaction, Sympathy For The Devil, Play With Fire, Thru & Thru.U2 : One, With You Or Without You, Beautiful DayAin't Too Proud To Beg by The TemptationsStand By Me by Ben E KingThe Thrill Is Gone by B.B. KingOnly The Lonely & Pretty Woman by Roy OrbisonThat's Amore by Dean MartinHit The Road Jack & What'd I Say by Ray CharlesA Change Is Gonna Come by Sam CookeOh Girl & Have You Seen Her by The Chi-litesSmooth Operator by SadeJohnny Be Good & You Never Can Tell by Chuck BerryWhat A Wonderful World by Louis ArmstrongSomewhere Over The Rainbow by Israel IZCan't Take My Eyes Off of You by Frankie Vallie & The 4 Seasons.Smoke On The Water by Deep PurpleHave You Even Seen The Rain by Credence Clearwater RevivalGround Of Divorce and One Day Like This by The ElbowSinging In The Rain by Gene KellyHotel California by The EaglesNever Tear Us Apart by INXSYou Are Beautiful by James BluntYou Are So Beautiful by Joe CockerWhen The Lights Go Down by JourneyLowride by WarSolitary Man by Neil DiamondBorn To Be Wild by SteppenwolfRespect by Aretha FranklinCalifornia Dreamin' by The Mamas & The PapasSledgehammer & Solsbury Hill by Peter GabrielDowntown by Petula ClarkHip To Be Square by Huey Lewis & The NewsWhere's My Mind by The PixiesCarnival of Rust by Poets Of The FallSound of Muzak by Porcupine TreeLoosing My Religion by REMDesert Rose by StingEvery Breath You Take by The PoliceTake Me Out Tonight by The SmithsTime Of The Season by The ZombiesDead Man Walking by The ScriptWicked Games by Chris IsaacWind Of Change by The ScorpionsOn The Road Again by Willie NelsonAgainst The Wind by Bob Seger & The Silver Bullet BandFree Bird by Lynyrd SkynyrdThe Story of My Life my Marty Robbins Also see: What are the most beautiful lyrics you have ever heard?What is your favourite lyric line from a song?What films do you remember for their music/sound?Music Recommendations: What are some good "long" songs?

To me, the all-time greatest English songs I have ever heard include:  Albert King - Born Under A Bad SignAlter Bridge - Blackbird B.B. King - The Thrill Is Gone The Beach Boys - Surfer Girl, God Only Knows, Good Vibrations The Beatles - I Saw Her Standing There, Twist and Shout (The Isley Brothers cover), All My Loving, In My Life, Yesterday, Strawberry Fields Forever, A Day In The Life, Blackbird, Helter Skelter, Here, There And Everywhere, Eleanor Rigby, Taxman, I Want You (She's So Heavy), Let It Be, Across The Universe, Michelle, Something, Here Comes The Sun, While My Guitar Gently Weeps, Norwegian Wood (This Bird Has Flown), Yellow Submarine, With A Little Help From My Friends, Golden Slumbers/Carry That Weight/The End medley, I Will, Hey Jude, Tomorrow Never Knows Bee Gees - How Deep Is Your Love, I Started A Joke, TragedyBlack Sabbath - War Pigs, Paranoid, Children Of The Grave, Into The Void, Black Sabbath Bill Haley And His Comets - Rock Around The Clock Bob Dylan - Blowin' In The Wind, The Times They Are a-Changin', Mr. Tambourine Man, Like A Rolling Stone Bob Marley - Is This Love, Could You Be Loved, No Woman No Cry, I Shot The Sheriff, Get Up Stand Up, Redemption SongThe Carpenters - Close To You, We've Only Just Begun, Superstar, Sing, Yesterday Once More, Top Of The World The Cranberries - Zombie, Linger Cream - Sunshine Of Your Love, Badge, Crossroads (Robert Johnson cover) Crosby, Stills And Nash - Suite: Judy Blue Eyes Deep Purple - Child In Time, Highway Star, Space Truckin', Lazy, Smoke On The Water, Burn, MistreatedDerek and the Dominos - Layla Diana Ross - If We Hold On Together Diana Ross & The Supremes - You Can't Hurry LoveDire Straits - Sultans Of Swing, Money For Nothing The Doors - People Are Strange, Spanish Caravan, The Crystal Ship, Break On Through (To The Other Side), Strange Days, The End, Roadhouse Blues, Riders On The Storm,  Love StreetElton John - Your Song, Rocket Man, Don't Let The Sun Go Down On Me, Can You Feel The Love Tonight, Circle Of Life Elvis Presley - Jailhouse Rock, All Shook Up, Love Me Tender, Suspicious Minds, Are You Lonesome Tonight, A Little Less ConversationEminem - Lose Yourself Eric Clapton - Lay Down Sally, Wonderful Tonight, Tears In Heaven, Old Love, Cocaine Etta James - At Last Frank Sinatra - My Way, Fly Me To The Moon Gary Moore - Still Got The Blues, Parisienne Walkways, Empty RoomsGeorge Harrison - My Sweet Lord Gnarls Barkley - Crazy Guns N' Roses - Sweet Child O' Mine, Welcome To The Jungle, November Rain, Civil War, Don't CryThe Jackson 5 - I Want You Back, ABCJames Taylor - You've Got A Friend (Carole King cover), Fire And Rain, Don't Let Me Be Lonely TonightJeff Buckley - Hallelujah (Leonard Cohen cover), Lover, You Should've Come Over, Everybody Here Wants You, Grace, Eternal LifeJohn Lennon - Mother, Working Class Hero, Jealous Guy, Imagine John Mayer - Neon, Belief, Waiting On The World To Change, Stop This Train Journey - Don't Stop Believin', Open Arms, Separate Ways (Worlds Apart), Faithfully Jim Croce - Time In A Bottle The Jimi Hendrix Experience - Little Wing, Purple Haze, Voodoo Child (Slight Return), Manic Depression, Stone Free, All Along The Watchtower (Bob Dylan cover), Red House Blues Led Zeppelin - Since I've Been Loving You, Dazed And Confused, Whole Lotta Love, Going To California, Immigrant Song, Communication Breakdown, Rock And Roll, Black Dog, Babe I'm Gonna Leave You (Joan Baez cover), Stairway To Heaven, KashmirLinkin Park - In The End Lynyrd Skynyrd - Free Bird, Sweet Home Alabama, Simple Man Megadeth - Holy Wars (The Punishment Due), Tornado Of Souls, Symphony Of Destruction Metallica - Fade To Black, Master Of Puppets, One, Enter Sandman, Nothing Else Matters, The UnforgivenMichael Buble - Everything Michael Jackson - Billie Jean, Beat It, Wanna Be Startin' Somethin', Don't Stop Till You Get Enough, Smooth Criminal, Black Or White, Dirty Diana, Human Nature, Man In The Mirror, She's Out Of My Life, You Are Not Alone, ThrillerNat King Cole - L.O.V.E Nirvana - About A Girl, In Bloom, Smells Like Teen Spirit, Lithium, Come As You Are, Heart-Shaped Box, Sliver, Where Did You Sleep Last Night (Leadbelly cover), All Apologies Patsy Cline - Crazy Paul McCartney - Maybe I'm Amazed, Calico Skies, Jenny Wren Pearl Jam - Alive, Black, Animal, Yellow Ledbetter, Release Pink Floyd - Money, Comfortably Numb, Wish You Were HereThe Police - Message In A Bottle, Every Breath You Take, RoxanneQueen - Bohemian Rhapsody, Under Pressure, Crazy Little Thing Called Love, Stone Cold Crazy, I Want It All, We Will Rock You, We Are The Champions, Innuendo, The Show Must Go OnR. Kelly - I Believe I Can Fly Richard Marx - Now And Forever, Right Here Waiting The Rolling Stones - Brown Sugar, Beast Of Burden, Jumpin' Jack Flash, Gimme Shelter, Angie, Wild Horses, (I Can't Get No) SatisfactionRoy Orbison - Cryin', Oh Pretty Woman, Only The Lonely Simon And Garfunkel - Bridge Over Troubled Water, Cecilia, America, The Sound Of Silence, Scarborough Fair/Canticle, Mrs. Robinson, The Boxer Stevie Ray Vaughan - Texas Flood (Larry Davis cover), Life By The Drop, CrossfireU2 - Sunday Bloody Sunday, Where The Streets Have No Name, I Still Haven't Found What I'm Looking For, Even Better Than The Real Thing, Vertigo, Elevation, One, Mysterious Ways, The Sweetest Thing, Magnificent Van Morrison - Brown-Eyed Girl, Moondance
